name: The Figma Store - Poster Layouts
description:
To celebrate the launch of the new Figma Store, not only I modeled with my new, fabulous swag, but also had some fun designing some promotional posters of my new stuff.


Hope you like them and please, use and abuse the layouts for whatever you're promoting too.


PS: This is a personal project and not at all sanctioned by the Figma team ðŸ˜…
